properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 16 at 3:21AM PST until February 18 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and steep seas 11 to 13 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and steep seas building to 8 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM Monday to 3 AM PST
Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening
to 3 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the steep waves mentioned
above there is a swell around 7 feet at 12 seconds that will
slowly diminish through tonight. There is also a long period
swell building into the waters this morning and peaking around 7
feet at 15 seconds on Monday.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO 3 AM PST TUESDAY
